animeDescription: Sometime in the distant future, Kurumi, Saki and Karinka share an apartment with another girl named Excelia. One day, after school, Kurumi tells everyone that she is in love with a man she met named Michihito Kagura, but she doesn't know when she will see him again. (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Takahashi, Naohito', 'Director'], ['Watanabe, Jun', 'Sound Director'], ['Kimura, Shinichiro', 'Episode Director'], ['Tanaka, Rie', 'Theme Song Performance']]
